title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Professional Development Education via Peer Feedback Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply four peer feedback design conditions (privacy, contact method, delivery channel, consensus method) in practice within four weeks.
Learners improve self-reflection and interpersonal skills by at least 30% during feedback-giving/receiving processes in PBL tasks.
Learners achieve at least a 40% improvement rate in learning tasks using a blended-channel (written + verbal) feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
